mapper.select: SELECT PERMIT_URL FROM MN_SYS_PERMIT WHERE PERMIT_TYPE = 0 AND id IN ( SELECT PREMIT_ID FROM MN_SYS_ROLE_PERMIT WHERE ROLE_ID IN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM MN_SYS_USER_ROLE WHERE USER_ID = ( SELECT id FROM MN_SYS_USER WHERE USER_NAME = #{0}) ) ) UNION SELECT MENU_URL PERMIT_URL FROM MN_SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ENABLE = 1 and MENU_URL is not null AND id IN ( SELECT PREMIT_ID FROM MN_SYS_ROLE_PERMIT WHERE ROLE_ID IN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM MN_SYS_USER_ROLE WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT id FROM MN_SYS_USER WHERE USER_NAME = #{0}) )
